name: amfori - Trade with Purpose
goal: We are a the leading business association of global commerce that enables organisations to enhance human prosperity, use natural resources responsibly and drive open trade globally.  We call this Trade with Purpose.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: We are concerned with all initiatives relating to international trade and both social and environmental sustainability.
